医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
限时饮食与运动相结合：小改变，大影响研究表明，将限时饮食与锻炼相结合，可以小幅但显着地减少脂肪量和体脂百分比，同时保留无脂体重。然而，结果的可变性和较短的研究持续时间凸显了进一步研究的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Time-restricted-eating-paired-with-exercise-Small-changes-big-impact.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Time-restricted-eating-paired-with-exercise-Small-changes-big-impact.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a78639a-b3fd-4d69-9038-b614fe08a37e Mon, 13 Jan 2025 23:35:00 -0500 Time-restricted eating paired with exercise: Small changes, big impact
早上喝咖啡可以降低健康风险，但全天喝咖啡并不能降低健康风险早上适量喝咖啡可能会降低全因死亡和心血管死亡风险，但全天喝咖啡并没有类似的好处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Morning-coffee-cuts-health-risks-but-all-day-sipping-doesne28099t.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Morning-coffee-cuts-health-risks-but-all-day-sipping-doesne28099t.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af59307e-5bf6-4b39-b3a1-f4b750801348 Mon, 13 Jan 2025 22:41:00 -0500 Morning coffee cuts health risks, but all-day sipping doesn’t
UQ 和 Vaxxas 荣获全球奖项，加速基于补丁的 mRNA 疫苗的 COVID-19澳大利亚生物工程和纳米技术研究所 (AIBN) 内的昆士兰大学 BASE 设施和总部位于布里斯班的生物技术公司 Vaxxas 已宣布成为一项享有声望的全球奖项的阶段获奖者，以加速开发基于贴片的 mRNA 疫苗的 COVID-19。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/UQ-and-Vaxxas-win-global-prize-to-accelerate-patch-based-mRNA-vaccine-for-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/UQ-and-Vaxxas-win-global-prize-to-accelerate-patch-based-mRNA-vaccine-for-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31066561-0bff-4bb6-bb14-95b37f547790 Mon, 13 Jan 2025 22:26:27 -0500 UQ and Vaxxas win global prize to accelerate patch-based mRNA vaccine for COVID-19
视网膜血管指纹提供非侵入性方法来预测中风风险网上发表的研究发现，眼睛后部的光敏组织层（视网膜）上的血管“指纹”可以像传统的风险因素一样准确地预测一个人的中风风险，但不需要进行多次侵入性实验室测试。在《心》杂志上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Retina-angio-fingerprint-offers-non-guarantee-way-to-predict-中风-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Retina-angio-fingerprint-offers-non-guarantee-way-to-predict-中风-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e2c9624-89b2-43fa-9e21-f8a1fc912daf Mon, 13 Jan 2025 22:20:00 -0500 Retina vascular fingerprint offers non-invasive way to predict stroke risk
美国国防部向 OSU 拨款 1190 万美元用于药物输送研究美国国防部已向俄勒冈州立大学拨款高达 1190 万美元，用于发明新的药物输送技术，以保护军人在战斗地区免受一系列健康威胁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/US-Department-of-Defense-awards-24119-million-to-OSU-for-drug-delivery-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/US-Department-of-Defense-awards-24119-million-to-OSU-for-drug-delivery-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ab0890a-a823-4dfe-a85c-aa9d8fe6c79e Mon, 13 Jan 2025 22:16:05 -0500 U.S. Department of Defense awards $11.9 million to OSU for drug delivery research
澳大利亚 2 型糖尿病发病率有所下降，但差异仍然存在2010 年至 2019 年，澳大利亚 2 型糖尿病发病率总体下降，但年轻男性和特定种族群体的发病率有所上升，凸显了持续存在的差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Australia-sees-a-decline-in-type-2-diabetes-but-disparities-persist.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Australia-sees-a-decline-in-type-2-diabetes-but-disparities-persist.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64574f61-b284-4fc5-a7fe-8a9ddc378306 Mon, 13 Jan 2025 22:15:00 -0500 Australia sees a decline in type 2 diabetes, but disparities persist
研究揭示常见基因治疗测量技术的不准确性在一项对最有前途的尖端医学治疗之一具有影响的发现中，研究人员评估了基因治疗中常用的几种测量技术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Research-reveals-inaccuracies-in-common-gene-therapy-measurement-technique.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Research-reveals-inaccuracies-in-common-gene-therapy-measurement-technique.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e57cbd6-8f19-407e-bcfd-cb6d62fc771d Mon, 13 Jan 2025 22:09:22 -0500 Research reveals inaccuracies in common gene therapy measurement technique
研究人员发现血管周围细胞在血管功能障碍中的作用俄勒冈健康与科学大学的研究人员发现了小血管周围的特殊细胞（称为血管周围细胞）如何导致癌症、糖尿病和纤维化等慢性疾病中的血管功能障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Researchers-uncover-role-of-periangio-cells-in-blood-vessel-dysfunction-Researchers-At-Orego.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Researchers-uncover-role-of-periangio-cells-in-blood-vessel-dysfunction-Researchers-At-Orego.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4689b7bb-2a90-4ef3-908e-bd2b9f91befb Mon, 13 Jan 2025 21:55:00 -0500 Researchers uncover role of perivascular cells in blood vessel dysfunction
新推动更严格的化学法，保护儿童免受有害接触研究强调合成化学品对儿童健康的影响日益加大，将其与非传染性疾病联系起来，并提倡制定严格的全球法规。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/New-push-for-stricter-chemical-laws-to-shield-kids-from-harmful-exposure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/New-push-for-stricter-chemical-laws-to-shield-kids-from-harmful-exposure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b3da5c7-0a53-47ae-8085-b39bc882dc37 Mon, 13 Jan 2025 21:49:00 -0500 New push for stricter chemical laws to shield kids from harmful exposure
COVID-19 感染与 ME/CFS 病例增加有关美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 研究新冠病毒以促进康复 (RECOVER) 计划的新发现表明，感染 SARS-CoV-2（导致 COVID-19 的病毒）可能与肌痛性脑脊髓炎数量增加有关/慢性疲劳综合症（ME/CFS）病例。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/COVID-19-infection-linked-to-increased-cases-of-MECFS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/COVID-19-infection-linked-to-increased-cases-of-MECFS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fbce34e1-b832-4219-97c7-a3d1163ef49e Mon, 13 Jan 2025 21:48:13 -0500 COVID-19 infection linked to increased cases of ME/CFS
